name: Ewellia and the Magic Bag
description:
Ewellia and the Magic Bag is our very first 2D platform game with a cute and funny universe. The game is still in development, this is the demo version. To find out more or simply join our community, do not hesitate to come to our Discord.

Ewellia, a cat girl who sells candy, will unwittingly find herself plunged into an adventure to try to retrieve her magic bag of which she is the guardian. She will make fun encounters, some will even become her friends and others her enemies. Her kindness makes her a character much appreciated by the inhabitants of her world and her feline side and determination makes her a flexible character ready to take on the challenge.

Features:
  • the very first story of Ewellia
  • 5 different worlds, for a total of 25 levels and 5 boss fights
  • running, jumping, climbing, sliding and many other actions
  • collect the candies to unlock illustrations and music from the game
  • a speedrun mode for fans of the genre, with a world ranking and organized events

And if you like our game and want to support us, you can help us through our Patreon page.
